type.name: external_identification_item
type.description: This select extends the assignments of identification to externally defined item such as files or Document definitions.

entity.name: External_item_identification_assignment
entity.description:
An External_item_identification_assignment is a type of Identification_assignment that is used to establish the identification of externally defined items. The identification of the externally defined item involves the specification of a location in a physical or digital storage system.
An External_item_identification_assignment may be applied to a extensible list of items, currently including the following : document definition and file.
